name: Circles
description: I chose to create an art piece inspired by the artist Tyler Hobbs. The ides a was to create different circles in different layers in different sizes.

name: Bubbles
description: This is a variation of the first project in the shape of bubbules, different sizes and colors.

name: Moving Bubbles
description: The third project is a moving variation of the bubbles to imitate underwater bubbles.

name: Circles circles circles
description: This is a recreation of the flowers. I have changed it to circles in different sizes and colours.
